name: CMMS Codespace
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get remove -y docker docker-engine docker.io wmdocker && sudo apt-get install -y ca-certificates curl gnupg && sudo mkdir -m 0755 -p /etc/apt/keyrings && curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg && echo "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) stable" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io && sudo systemctl start docker && sudo systemctl enable docker && sudo curl -L "https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.29.2/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m)" -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose && docker-compose up -d
